GenAiFunction.description: Shows payment records, tenant records and contact records associated with payments that are delayed for more than a month. Phrases like show me tenants of payments delayed for more than a month or show me payments delayed for more than a month or Contact associated with payments delayed for more than a month can trigger this action.
GenAiFunction.masterLabel: Get Payments Delayed More Than a Month
GenAiFunction.progressIndicatorMessage: Displaying the tenant & contact records, with payments delayed more than a month
